channel.title: This is tough, if possible, could use ur help lescape ^.^
channel.description:
Is there a way to make it so you can only wield weapons/wear armour if you killed a certain(amount of) monster(s)? If not, so you can only equip/wear if you finished a certain quest(need help with making quest :D)
[b][i][u][s][size=30pt]THANK YOU[/size][/s][/u][/i][/b]

item.title: This is tough, if possible, could use ur help lescape ^.^
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

It’s really not that hard to add tokens. Search for something like quest_3 or something and look around for it until you find a part where it writes to a .txt file such as in the moreinfo folder.

Read full topic
